name: Center Console Organizer Tray Compatible with Hyundai Tucson Limited/Hybrid/Tucson Hybrid SEL 2022-2024 Accessories (Automatic Transmission ONLY), Insert Armrest Interior Storage Box, Red
about_this_item: [FITMENT]: Fit 2022 2023 2024 Tucson Gas Limited / Plug-in Hybrid / Hybrid (Electronic Version of Automatic Transmission ONLY).
[FITMENT]: Fit Tucson Gas (SE / SEL / XRT / N Line) 2022-2024 and Santa Cruz (SE / SEL / Night / XRT / Limited) 2022-2024 with stick shifter transmission (The mounting tray will be a little tight).
[PREMIUM MATERIAL]: Made from ABS plastic with rubber pads which keep things from sliding around and rattling inside. The plastic is tough enough to withstand the impact of your driving on the road.
[MAKE FULL USE OF SPACE]: This center console accessory turns it into a 2-layer armrest box. Keeping your essentials in upper tray and storing anything used less down below.
[QUICK ASSEMBLY]: Precisely matches your console armrest. No tools required, easy and quick to install,In just a few seconds.

title: Nice console organizer
content: This console organizer fit perfectly in my Tucson and provides a nice separate place to put things instead of just the big "bucket" in the console that came with my 2024 Tucson Hybrid.

title: fits perfect but missing a few things
content: As a Tucson owner you realize that oddly, Hyundai does not supply a tray for the center console. This organizer is the missing link. The tray has a good depth of 2 inches and there are 3 trays that come with removable, rubber like cushions.  It fits a bit tight for my liking and without some weight in the tray has tendency to lift up in the rear.  This could be from variances in the car or the tray.  There are no cushions in the coin section and unless tightly pack, they will rattle a bit.  Otherwise, a very good enhancement to your Tucson center console.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Installed this in a few seconds as it just lays in the opening, no tools needed. It does a great job utilizing the space in the middle console. Tucson's have just one big area within the console. It is nice to have that space, but I would spend a lot of time digging through it trying to find sunglasses, change, and other things. With this, I can have the smaller items on top and organized. The bigger items can then be stored below it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023

title: Perfect fit for 2024 SEL Convenience Tucson
